settings.code:
OUR STORY

Founded by two brothers with a shared vision and love for the ocean, our journey began as online suppliers of swimming pool mosaics and tiles. As our reputation for quality and service spread, so too did our unique product offerings - launching us to become a leading authority for pools, outdoor living spaces and home interiors. At the heart of our business is a team of service-oriented professionals who share a passion for innovation, creativity and a dedication to exceeding customer expectations. From our knowledgeable customer support specialists to our experienced design consultants, every member of our team is committed to providing personalized service and expert guidance to our valued customers.

OUR MISSION

We believe that everyone deserves to experience the beauty and serenity of paradise – right in their own backyard or living space. That's why our mission is to empower our customers to create their own personal oasis, tailored to their unique tastes and preferences. Whether you're a homeowner seeking to infuse your living space with personality, or an interior designer striving to create unforgettable environments for your clients, we are here to support and inspire you every step of the way.

settings.title: TRUST
settings.text: We dedicate ourselves to honest and transparent business practices. This extends internally and externally from customer service to our management team.

settings.title: SERVICE
settings.text: We strive to deliver exceptional service. From start to finish, our expert design consultants are available to assist with any project.

settings.title: CARE
settings.text: We treat our customers and employees as if they were our own family. Care is at the heart of everything we do.

settings.title: VALUE
settings.text: We offer high-quality products at competitive prices and exceptional customer support, dedicated to maximizing your value with every purchase.

settings.code:
OUR COMMITMENT

At AquaBlu Mosaics, we believe in the power of giving back. That's why every product sale includes a donation to support environmental conservation efforts. With a deep appreciation for the beauty and importance of our oceans and natural world, we are committed to protecting marine ecosystems, preserving biodiversity, and promoting sustainable practices. By choosing AquaBlu Mosaics, you're not just enhancing your living space – you're also making a positive impact on the health of our planet. Join us in our efforts to protect and preserve the natural wonders that inspire us every day.

settings.text:

SERVICE – We strive to deliver exceptional service. From start to finish, our expert design consultants are available to assist with any project. 

CARE – We treat our customers and employees as if they were our own family. Care is at the heart of everything we do.

VALUE – We provide top-quality products at fair pricing, paired with industry-leading customer support. AquaBlu is committed to providing the utmost value in every purchase.

settings.testimonial: Fantastic company to work with. Very informative. They care about their customers.
settings.author: Chris B.

settings.testimonial: Shopping with AquaBlu has always been effortless, with quick shipping. The glow-in-the-dark glass tiles are wonderful!
settings.author: Jodi K.

settings.testimonial: The selection of mosaics is amazing in comparison to other sites. The pricing is competitive as well.
settings.author: Vaughn V.

settings.testimonial: AquaBlu's website is so user friendly! I ordered samples and they came very quickly. I'm now ordering tile for my bathroom that I absolutely LOVE!
settings.author: Candice S.

settings.testimonial: AquaBlu is always a great resource for our needs as a commercial pool builder.
settings.author: Molly P.
